amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used for the Alliance for NanoHealth.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the Alliance for NanoHealth.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A038) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Flake.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A038) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
